alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 9:31PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Ashtabula, Erie and northern Crawford Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 930 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Conneaut to near North Kingsville to 9 miles north of Pymatuning North. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Erie, Conneaut, Corry, Edinboro, North East, Union City, Girard, North Kingsville, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Wattsburg, Canadohta Lake, Riceville, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville and Lake City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
